com.topcoder.forum.service.ejb
Interface JiveForumService

All Known Subinterfaces:
JiveForumServiceLocal, JiveForumServiceRemote
All Known Implementing Classes:
JiveForumServiceBean, MockJiveForumService
public interface JiveForumService

This interface defines contract to manage the Jive Forum. It provides functionalities in line with the JiveForumManager class.

Thread safety: Implementations need to be thread-safe.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Standlove, TCSDEVELOPER

Method Summary
 long createCategory(CategoryConfiguration categoryConfiguration)
           Creates a new category according to the category configuration.

           Gets the user's role in a category.

           Creates a watch for a user in a category, forum or thread.
 

Method Detail

watch

void watch(long userId,
           long entityId,
           EntityType entityType)
           throws JiveForumManagementException

Creates a watch for a user in a category, forum or thread. Given a user id and either a category, forum or thread id, if the user was not previously watching it, add the watch.

Parameters:
userId - the id of the user to watch the entity
entityId - the entity id
entityType - the entity type
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the userId or entityId isn't above 0, or if entityType is null
UserNotFoundException - if there is no user with the given userId in jive forum
ForumEntityNotFoundException - if there is no entity for the given entityId in jive forum
JiveForumManagementException - if any other error occurs when calling jive forum APIs

isWatched

boolean isWatched(long userId,
                  long entityId,
                  EntityType entityType)
                  throws JiveForumManagementException

Gets whether a user is watching a category, forum or thread. Given a user id and either a category, forum or thread id, return whether the user is already watching it.

Parameters:
userId - the id of the user to get watching status for
entityId - the entity id
entityType - the entity type
Returns:
true if the forum entity is watched, false otherwise
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the userId or entityId isn't above 0, or if entityType is null
UserNotFoundException - if there is no user with the given userId in jive forum
ForumEntityNotFoundException - if there is no entity for the given entityId in jive forum
JiveForumManagementException - if any other error occurs when calling jive forum APIs

setUserRole

void setUserRole(long userId,
                 long categoryId,
                 UserRole role)
                 throws JiveForumManagementException

Sets the user's role in the specified category. Given a user id and a category id, one of these roles can be assigned:
No access: the user must not belong to moderators or users groups
Contributor: the user must just belong to users group
Moderator: the user must just belong to moderators group

Parameters:
userId - the id of the user to set role for
categoryId - the category id
role - the role
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the userId or categoryId isn't above 0, or if the role is null
UserNotFoundException - if there is no user with the given userId in the jive forum
ForumEntityNotFoundException - if there is no category for the given categoryId in jive forum
JiveForumManagementException - if any other error occurs when calling jive forum APIS

getUserRole

UserRole getUserRole(long userId,
                     long categoryId)
                     throws JiveForumManagementException

Gets the user's role in a category. Given a user id and a category id, return whether the user has no access, is contributor or moderator, depending on the groups the user belongs.

Parameters:
userId - the id of user to get role for
categoryId - the category id
Returns:
the user's role in the category
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the userId or categoryId isn't above 0
UserNotFoundException - if there is no user with the given userId in jive forum
ForumEntityNotFoundException - if there is no category for the given categoryId in jive forum
JiveForumManagementException - if any other error occurs when calling jive forum APIS

createCategory

long createCategory(CategoryConfiguration categoryConfiguration)
                    throws JiveForumManagementException

Creates a new category according to the category configuration. It creates a new category, and if a template category is specified, it will also copy all the contents. It will create the category and set its properties and then create groups and set permissions. User should provide either template category id or template category type if a template category is necessary.

Parameters:
categoryConfiguration - the new category configuration.
Returns:
the newly created category id.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if categoryConfiguration is null, or its name/description/versionText is null/empty string, or if its componentId/versionId/rootCategoryId is isn't above 0
UserNotFoundException - if there is no user with given moderationUserId in jive forum
ForumEntityNotFoundException - if there is no category for the given template category id / root category id in jive forum
JiveForumManagementException - if any other error occurs when calling jive forum APIs
